data.comment: Craig Halkett  - Heart of Midlothian -  won a free kick in defence.
Fouled by Melker Hallberg  - St. Johnstone
Missed chance. Paul McGowan  - Dundee -  shot with right foot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assist -  Jordan Marshall.
Goal!  Motherwell 3, St. Mirren 2. Dean Cornelius  - Motherwell -  shot with right foot from the centre of the box.
Goal!  Dundee 1, Aberdeen 2. Ross McCrorie  - Aberdeen -  shot with right foot from the centre of the box    after corner.
First Half starts.
Missed chance. Connor Shields  - Motherwell -  shot with right foot from outside the box goes high. Assist -  Ross Tierney.
Shot blocked. Sean Goss  - Motherwell -  shot with left foot from outside the box is blocked.
Borna Barisic  - Rangers -  won a free kick in defence.
Shot blocked. Amad Diallo  - Rangers -  shot with right foot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assist -  Fashion Sakala.
Corner -  Rangers. Conceded by Jake Carroll.
Corner -  Rangers. Conceded by Ricki Lamie.
Missed chance. James Tavernier  - Rangers -  shot with right foot from outside the box goes high. Assist -  Steven Davis.
New attacking attempt. Callum Slattery  - Motherwell -  shot with right foot from outside the box is saved in the left corner. Assist -  Sean Goss.
Corner -  Motherwell. Conceded by Allan McGregor.
Shot blocked. Scott Arfield  - Rangers -  shot with right foot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Missed chance. James Tavernier  - Rangers -  shot with right foot from outside the box is close, but missed to the left. Assist -  Scott Wright.
Corner -  Motherwell. Conceded by Scott Arfield.
Offside - Rangers. Scott Arfield with a pass, however Fashion Sakala is in offside.
Callum Slattery  - Motherwell -  won a free kick on the right wing.
Fouled by Amad Diallo  - Rangers
Dean Cornelius  - Motherwell -  won a free kick on the right wing.
Fouled by Leon Balogun  - Rangers
Leon Balogun  - Rangers -  receive red card.
Substitution -  Rangers. Calvin Bassey for Amad Diallo.
